additionalProperties.description: Objects of this type represent runtime information about the system Adaptive Framework is running on. The meta of instances of _AdaptiveSystemInfo_ should contain the description of the instance plus supplemental property type information.

_AdaptiveSystemInfo_.description: Objects of this type represent runtime information about the system Adaptive Framework is running on. The meta of instances of _AdaptiveSystemInfo_ should contain the description of the instance plus supplemental property type information.
